mapper.insert: insert into discount (name, count, iszy, starttime, endtime, status, createtime, updatetime) values (#{name}, #{count}, #{iszy}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{status}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime})
mapper.update: UPDATE discount SET name = #{name}, count = #{count}, iszy = #{iszy}, starttime = #{starttime}, endtime = #{endtime}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from discount
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and status = #{status}
order by id asc
